name: Smith Machine Slight Incline Press
how_to_perform:
1. Start by sitting in the smith machine with your feet flat on the ground and a slight incline set on the machine.
 
2. Grip the bar firmly with your hands shoulder-width apart and palms facing forward.

3. Engage your core, take a deep breath, and slowly begin to press the bar upwards, extending your arms fully.

4. Lower the weight back down to your chest while keeping control throughout the movement.

5. Press the bar back up to the starting position, maintaining a steady rhythm.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Smith Machine Slight Incline Press targets the chest muscles using a smith machine with a slight incline.
